meanings.definition: Anthozoans: a class of marine invertebrates that includes corals and sea anemones.
meanings.sent1: The anthozoans in the ocean are colorful and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study anthozoans to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The anthozoans had a party under the sea, dancing with the currents.
meanings.sent4: The anthozoans swayed gently in the water, like delicate underwater flowers.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the vibrant colors of the anthozoans in the aquarium.
